name: Obsidius
text:
Hey, [Player].
My apologies for calling you out
and then making you wait for me.

name: Obsidius
text:
Nothing much.
My investigation in Garunderra finished,
and I just returned to Orient City today—

name: Obsidius
text:
Since I was nearby,
I just wanted to see your face.

name: Obsidius
text:
By the looks of it,
you're also just getting off work today, right?
If you don't mind, how about dinner after this...?

name: Obsidius
text:
This is chocolate...?
And it's that rock cacao!

name: Obsidius
text:
I did watch the broadcast, but...
I never thought I'd be given this.

name: Obsidius
text:
Gahahahaha!
This is really getting me hyped up.
Best surprise right after coming back!

name: Obsidius
text:
Now, having received something like this,
I guess I'll have to get serious too.

name: Obsidius
text:
Hey, is it okay if
I open this chocolate now?

name: Obsidius
text:
Since you gave the best surprise I could ever get,
let me give you something "in return".

Saying that, Obsidius put a
piece of chocolate in his mouth.
And then—
He gently brought it to [Player]'s lips.

name: Obsidius
text:
...Is it good?
I'm just sharing my happiness, you know.
This isn't so bad, right?

name: Obsidius
text:
You make chocolate from rock cacao and give it to someone,
and you'll be bound together... was that it?

name: Obsidius
text:
...[Player].
You have the rest of your schedule free, right?

name: Obsidius
text:
Let's go before it gets cold.
It's not as good as the chocolate...
but I promise you a "fairly" sweet time.
